recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: 1. Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water according to package instructions.
2. In a pan, cook pancetta with garlic until crispy.
3. Beat the eggs and mix with grated parmesan, salt, and pepper.
4. Drain the spaghetti and combine with pancetta and garlic.
5. Off the heat, stir in the egg mixture quickly to avoid scrambling.
6. Serve with extra parmesan and black pepper.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: 1. Cook fettuccine according to package instructions.
2. Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper, then cook in a skillet until golden brown.
3. In the same skillet, add butter and garlic, then stir in cream.
4. Add parmesan and simmer until the sauce thickens.
5. Slice the chicken and toss with pasta and sauce.
6. Serve with extra parmesan.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
instructions: 1. Cook ground beef in a skillet over medium heat until browned.
2. Add taco seasoning and a bit of water, then simmer.
3. Warm the tortillas in a pan or microwave.
4. Assemble the tacos with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, sour cream, and salsa.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: 1. Heat sesame oil in a pan, add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
2. Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
3. Mix soy sauce and cornstarch with a bit of water, then pour into the pan.
4. Stir-fry until sauce thickens and coats the vegetables.
5. Serve with cooked rice.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: 1. Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper, then cook in a skillet until golden and fully cooked.
2. Chop the chicken and let it cool.
3. In a large bowl, toss the lettuce with Caesar dressing, parmesan, and croutons.
4. Top with cooked chicken and extra parmesan.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F).
2. Roll out the pizza dough and spread the tomato sauce evenly.
3. Add mozzarella cheese and fresh basil leaves.
4. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
5. Bake for 10-15 minutes until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.

recipes.name: Teriyaki Chicken
instructions: 1. Mix soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, sesame oil, and garlic in a bowl.
2. Marinate the chicken thighs in the sauce for at least 10 minutes.
3. Cook the chicken in a pan until fully cooked and browned.
4. Pour the remaining marinade into the pan and cook until it thickens.
5. Serve the chicken over rice, topped with sesame seeds.

recipes.name: Vegetable Soup
instructions: 1. Sauté onion, carrots, and celery in a large pot until softened.
2. Add the potatoes, zucchini, broth, and tomatoes.
3. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes.
4. Season with salt and pepper to taste before serving.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. Cream together butter, sugar, and brown sugar.
3. Add eggs and vanilla, then mix well.
4. In a separate bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt.
5. Gradually mix the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients.
6. Fold in chocolate chips.
7. Scoop the dough onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.name: Greek Salad
instructions: 1. Combine cucumbers, tomatoes, onion, feta, and olives in a bowl.
2. Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar.
3. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
4. Toss the salad gently and serve.
